titleStmt.title: A just and seasonable reprehension of naked breasts and shoulders written by a grave and learned papist ; translated by Edward Cooke, Esquire ; with a preface by Mr. Richard Baxter.
De l'abus des nudités de gorge. English
titleStmt.author: Boileau, Jacques, 1635-1716.
Cooke, Edward, fl. 1678.

notesStmt.note: Originally published as: De l'abus des nudités de gorge. 1675.
Attributed to J. Boileau. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Library of Congress.
